title: Has the Missouri Republicans passed a law that reduces the minimum wage in St. Louis from $10 to $7.70?
subtitle: The legislature of the State of Missouri, which is controlled by the Republic, passed a law in May 2017 to eliminate the increase in the minimum wage enacted by the city of St. Louis.
author: David Emery
vclaim: The Missouri Republic passed a bill to reduce the minimum wage in St. Louis from $10 per hour to $7.70.
